question: Is casimersen effective for the treatment of Duchenne muscular dystrophy?
ideal_answer: Yes, casimersen is effective for the treatment of Duchenne muscular dystrophy.

snippets.text: Casimersen received its first approval on 25 February 2021, in the USA, for the treatment of DMD in patients who have a confirmed mutation of the DMD gene that is amenable to exon 45 skipping.
he approval, granted under the US FDA Accelerated Approval Program, was based on an observed increase in dystrophin production in skeletal muscle in patients treated with casimersen
